# groupDisplayName

**Instance Property**

The localized name of the subscription group, suitable for display.

## Declaration

```swift
@backDeployed(before: iOS 17.0, macOS 14.0, tvOS 17.0, watchOS 10.0)
var groupDisplayName: String { get }
```

## Discussion

You provide a group display name in App Store Connect when you set up a subscription group. For more information, see [https://help.apple.com/app-store-connect/#/dev75708c031].

The [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SubscriptionStoreView] uses this value as part of the automatic marketing content if you don’t provide a marketing content view.



## Identifying the subscription group

- **subscriptionGroupID**: The subscription group identifier for this subscription.
- **groupLevel**: The rank of the subscription relative to other subscriptions in the same subscription group.
